__e: In God's name, I wish I could, senorita, but I must know the truth, no matter how painful the way.
Well, when you do have them you will know how painful it is to see them sad.

Seems its answer for us will be... painful and slow.
Maybe they just understand that life is pain, and if you smoke something or take a pill, it'll go away for a while.
I'll provide food with a painful but needed sacrifice.
It wasn't painful, but I had no choice. - Hi, Mom.
